body: - task: AppCenterTest@1
inputs:
app: $1  # Required  # Relative path from the repo root to the APK or IPA file you want to test.

artifactsDir: ${2:$(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)/AppCenterTest}  # Required  # Where to place the artifacts produced by the prepare step and used by the run step. This directory will be created if it does not exist.
#enablePrepare:  # Optional
framework: ${3:appium} # Options: 'appium', 'espresso', 'calabash', 'uitest', 'xcuitest' # Required
appiumBuildDir: $4  # Required when enablePrepare = true && framework = appium  # Path to directory with Appium tests.
#espressoBuildDir:  # Optional  # Path to Espresso output directory.
#espressoTestApkPath:  # Optional  # Path to APK file with Espresso tests. If not set, build-dir is used to discover it. Wildcard is allowed.
calabashProjectDir: $5  # Required when enablePrepare = true && framework = calabash  # Path to Calabash workspace directory.
#calabashConfigFile:  # Optional  # Path to Cucumber configuration file, usually cucumber.yml.
#calabashProfile:  # Optional  # Profile to run.  This value must exists in the Cucumber configuration file.
#calabashSkipConfigCheck:  # Optional  # Force running without Cucumber profile.
uitestBuildDir: $6  # Required when enablePrepare = true && framework = uitest  # Path to directory with built test assemblies.
#uitestStorePath:  # Optional
#uitestStorePass:  # Optional
#uitestKeyAlias:  # Optional
#uitestKeyPass:  # Optional
#uitestToolsDir:  # Optional  # Path to directory with Xamarin UI test tools that contains test-cloud.exe.
#signInfo:  # Optional  # Use Signing Infor for signing the test server.
#xcuitestBuildDir:  # Optional  # Path to the build output directory (usually $(ProjectDir)/Build/Products/Debug-iphoneos).
#xcuitestTestIpaPath:  # Optional  # Path to the *.ipa file with the XCUITest tests.
#prepareOpts:  # Optional  # Additional arguments passed to the App Center test prepare step.
#enableRun:  # Optional
credsType: ${7:serviceEndpoint} # Options: 'serviceEndpoint', 'inputs' # Required  # Use App Center service connection or enter credentials to connect to Visual Studio App Center.

serverEndpoint: $8  # Required when enableRun = true && credsType = serviceEndpoint  # Select the service connection for Visual Studio App Center. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service connection.
username: $9  # Required when enableRun = true && credsType = inputs  # Visit https://appcenter.ms/settings/profile to get your username.

password: $10  # Required when enableRun = true && credsType = inputs  # Visit https://appcenter.ms/settings/profile to set your password. It can accept a variable defined in build or release pipelines as '$(passwordVariable)'. You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

appSlug: $11  # Required when enableRun = true  # The app slug is in the format of {username}/{app_identifier}.  To locate {username} and {app_identifier} for an app, click on its name from https://appcenter.ms/apps, and the resulting URL is in the format of https://appcenter.ms/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}.
devices: $12  # Required when enableRun = true  # String to identify what devices this test will run against.  Copy and paste this string when you define a new test run from App Center Test beacon.
#series:  # Optional  # The series name for organizing test runs (e.g. master, production, beta).
#dsymDir:  # Optional  # Path to iOS symbol files.

locale: ${13:en_US} # Options: 'da_DK', 'nl_NL', 'en_GB', 'en_US', 'fr_FR', 'de_DE', 'ja_JP', 'ru_RU', 'es_MX', 'es_ES', 'user' # Required  # If your language isn't displayed, select 'Other' and enter its locale below, such as en_US.
#userDefinedLocale:  # Optional  # Enter any two-letter ISO-639 language code along with any two-letter ISO 3166 country code in the format [language]_[country], such as en_US.
#loginOpts:  # Optional  # Additional arguments passed to the App Center login step.
#runOpts:  # Optional  # Additional arguments passed to the App Center test run.
#async:  # Optional  # Execute command asynchronously, exit when tests are uploaded, without waiting for test results.
#cliLocationOverride:  # Optional  # Path to the App Center CLI on the build or release agent.
#debug:  # Optional  # Add --debug to the App Center CLI.
App Center test.description: Test app packages with Visual Studio App Center
